title: package.json
value:
{
  "name": "simple-web-notification",
  "version": "1.0.8",
  "description": "Web Notifications made easy.",
  "author": {
    "name": "Sagie Gur-Ari",
    "email": "sagiegurari@gmail.com"
  },
  "license": "Apache-2.0",
  "homepage": "http://github.com/sagiegurari/simple-web-notification",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "http://github.com/sagiegurari/simple-web-notification.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "http://github.com/sagiegurari/simple-web-notification/issues"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "web",
    "notification"
  ],
  "main": "web-notification.js",
  "directories": {
    "test": "test/spec",
    "example": "example"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "grunt test",
    "clean": "grunt cleanup",
    "lint": "grunt lint",
    "docs": "grunt docs",
    "format": "grunt format",
    "build": "grunt build",
    "jstest": "grunt jstest",
    "debug": "mocha --debug-brk=5858 --no-timeouts --ui bdd --reporter spec --recursive ./test/spec",
    "prepush": "npm run build",
    "postpublish": "grunt post-publish",
    "grunt": "grunt"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "chai": "latest",
    "grunt": "latest",
    "grunt-cli": "latest",
    "grunt-karma": "latest",
    "husky": "latest",
    "js-project-commons": "latest",
    "karma": "latest",
    "karma-cli": "latest",
    "karma-coverage": "latest",
    "karma-mocha": "latest",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "latest",
    "karma-sinon-chai": "latest",
    "lolex": "latest",
    "mocha": "latest",
    "phantomjs-prebuilt": "latest",
    "sinon": "latest",
    "sinon-chai": "latest"
  }
}
